name: Status-fyi
description: A tool to help you keep track of the status of your internship applicaitons.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://code.jquery.com/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.0/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/js/bootstrap.min.js https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css; object-src 'self'
